name: Meowton
description:
Meowton is a game made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022 with the theme ,,You are not alone".

The game was made in ~3days and it is my first game ever, so please tell me if you find bugs, glitches or if you want me to add more features to the game. Thanks! Enjoy Playing!

Black Cat: More Jump Power, but Less Movement Speed

Controls: ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, ArrowUp, ArrowDown (Change Camera)

White Cat: Less Jump Power, but More Movement Speed

Controls: A, D, W, S (Change Camera)
